attributes.comment:
This comment is in reference to the increase fees for immigration services.

It is a privilege on becoming a U.S. citizen. Those who appy should pay a
sufficient amount to off set the administrative services needed to do so. I feel the
increase is needed and American Taxpayers should not pay for these services.
Our country is becoming over populated as it is and I feel we need a moratorium in
the amount of immigrants granted in coming to this country. I feel most come to
use our country. They want everything for free; but our country gives back so
much and those wanting to come here to live must pay to do so.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Colette (Surname Unknown)
